Class AnimationPh3

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • AnimationPh3
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class AnimationPh3
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener
    An Animation is a character that reads and stores information about its properties. An Animation knows its simulated location in x and y as well as it's display location. An Animation also knows how to draw Maps.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • AnimationPh3

        public AnimationPh3(java.lang.String file,
                    java.lang.String type,
                    int platform,
                    int j,
                    int sc)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Constructs a sprite with interactive properties defined by the level file. Also parses the level file for data relevant to the sprite and saves it.
        Parameters:
        file - level filename
        type - level type (parcour or map)
        platform - the color of the tangible platforms
        j - jump velocity
        sc - level scale factor
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - throws an exception if the file does not exist
        java.lang.Exception
